storage_bucket_name.description: The name of the storage bucket, it should be gloablly unique.

bucket_public_access_prevention.description: Determine whether to enforce public access prevention on the bucket or inherit it from the organization policy

force_destroy_bucket.description: Boolean value to determine if the force deletion on buckets should be enabled or not.

role.description: Role that should be assigned to the identities.

members.description: List of identities that will be granted access to the resource.
